meanings.definition: In a brave and courageous manner
meanings.sent1: He faced his fears manfully and stood tall.
meanings.sent2: She manfully tackled the difficult task without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten tried to meow manfully like a lion.
meanings.sent4: The firefighter manfully charged into the burning building to save lives.
meanings.sent5: The soldier manfully defended his country against all odds.

meanings.sent1: The athlete manfully pushed through the last lap of the race.
meanings.sent2: He manfully lifted the heavy weights at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The chef manfully whipped up a storm in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She manfully faced the stormy weather to reach her destination.
meanings.sent5: The student manfully persevered through the challenging exam.

meanings.definition: Showing qualities traditionally associated with men
meanings.sent1: The knight displayed manfully courage in battle.
meanings.sent2: She gave a manfully handshake to seal the deal.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to bark manfully at the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood manfully tall in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range looked manfully majestic against the sunset.
